name: colorpimp
description: Online color scheme generator for monotone and mixed colors

scripts.build: npm run build:css && mkdir -p dist/styles dist/scripts && cp app/index.html dist/ && cp app/styles/main.css dist/styles/ && cp app/scripts/main.js dist/scripts/ && cp app/favicon.ico dist/ 2>/dev/null; cp app/robots.txt dist/ 2>/dev/null; true
scripts.serve: npm run build:css && npx http-server app -p 9000 -o
